title: Why millions of useable hard drives are being destroyed
description: It is estimated that 90% of hard drives are destroyed. Why aren't more wiped and reused?

title: Apple expected to launch mixed-reality headset at WWDC
description: The "Reality Pro" headset release is among announcements expected at Apple's Worldwide Developers Conference.

title: Elon Musk: Twitter snaps up top NBCUniversal executive
description: It comes just weeks after NBCUniversal's head of advertising Linda Yaccarino was named as Twitter's CEO.
